name: ORIGINAL ABSTRACT PAINTING - BUSINESS CARD CASE (blue)
description:
An original abstract acrylic painting on 2" x 3.5" canvas. Mounted to a metal business card case. Holds approximately 25 standard cards, but can be used for a variety of other things too!

Sealed with a durable finish. Please Allow 2-3 days to prepare your shipment. If you need your order in time for the holidays please make sure you place it no later than November 26. Ships with care via Canada Post from Toronto, Ontario.

name: Custom Watercolour Pet Portrait
description: This listing is for an original custom water colour pet portrait. DETAILS: Portraits are painted with Windsor & Newton watercolour & india ink on a 9" x 12" sheet of 100 lb hot press watercolour paper. Finished with a matte varnish and placed in a fitted cello-bag. Ships in a rigid mailer from Toronto, Ontario. ORDERING: Once you purchase this listing please send me an email with the name of your pet and a few good images of their face. The best photos are high-res and well lit, with a good amount of contrast between the subject and background. Generally speaking, the better the photo, the better the painting! In your email, also include a background colour preference (if you have one) and if you would prefer to receive an image of the finished portrait before shipping. Please allow a few days for your portrait to be completed and prepared for shipment. You will be notified by email when it has shipped. *If you need your order in time for the holidays, please make sure to place itno later than November 29. If you are ordering as a gift and need it before the holidays, please indicate this in your email, and (while no guarantees) I'll do my best to comply (extra shipping costs may apply).
